FuncDef: The reset local-access-user password history record command clears historical passwords of local access users. The reset local-access-user password history record command clears historical passwords of local access users. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears the historical passwords of the specified user.
If this parameter is not specified, the historical passwords of all local access users are cleared.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-sensitive characters without spaces.
